Yolande Marcelle Welimoum (a mụrụ n'October 9, 1988) bụ onye Cameroon na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye edemede. Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na ejije na Mahadum nke Yaoundé I

Ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2016 bụ Heritage bịara n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na mbipụta mbụ nke Concours du Scenario Festival, nke Ecrans Noirs Festival nke Yaounde, GIZ na KFW jikọrọ aka hazie. Ihe nketa na-ekwu maka nsogbu nke ụmụ nwanyị Cameroon na-eketa ihe onwunwe ezinụlọ, a gbanwere ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri akụkọ ifo nke otu aha ahụ. Welimoum gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ na Films Femmes Afrique, emume a raara nye isiokwu ụmụ nwanyị. Mgbe ọ na-agwa Deutsche Welle okwu banyere mmetọ mmekọahụ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Afrịka, o kwuru na ọ na-agbachitere onwe ya mgbe niile megide mmegide ndị na-achọghị site n'aka ndị nduzi nwoke. Welimoum bụ otu n'ime mmadụ atọ a mara ọkwa dịka ndị mmeri nke asọmpi 20th Écrans Noirs.
